title: AI For Business
instructors: Michael R. Roberts; Kartik Hosanagar; Peter Cappelli; Kevin Werbach; Raghu Iyengar; Matthew Bidwell; Prasanna Tambe; Lynn Wu
modules: 4 courses (e.g., AI Fundamentals for Non-Data Scientists ~9h; AI Applications in Marketing and Finance ~6h)
description: Fundamentals of Big Data, AI & ML; governance frameworks and ethics; AI in people management; data-driven marketing & personalization; implement ethical AI strategies.
key_skills: Data Governance; Data Security; Credit Risk; AI Personalization; Generative AI; Fraud detection; Business Strategy; Responsible AI; AI Product Strategy; Machine Learning; ML Methods/Algorithms; Artificial Intelligence; Data Ethics; Governance; HR Tech; Big Data; Business Transformation; Analytics

title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI)
description: Explain core AI concepts; ML, deep learning, neural networks; analyze role of generative AI in business; design a generative AI solution with ethical considerations.
key_skills: Responsible AI; Natural Language Processing; Market Opportunities; Generative AI; LLM Application

title: IBM AI Foundations for Business
modules: 3 courses (Introduction to AI; What is Data Science?; The AI Ladder)
description: AI concepts for business leaders; data science foundations; information architecture; business process automation; strategy; the IBM AI Ladder framework.
key_skills: Information Architecture; Business Process Automation; Data Architecture; Strategic Decision-Making; Responsible AI; Data Analysis; Business Strategy; Data Literacy; Enterprise Architecture; Data Mining; Generative AI; NLP

title: AI, Business & the Future of Work
description: How AI changes work and organizations; adoption, risks, ethics; human-AI collaboration; future of jobs and strategy implications.
key_skills: Strategy; Automation; Business Transformation; AI Governance; Ethics

title: Introduction to AI for Finance Professionals
modules: 4 modules; includes hands-on prompting exercises, AI in finance, final assessment; 4 assignments (AI-graded).
description: AI & GenAI literacy for finance; risks & best practices; prompting techniques; finance-specific use cases; create a finance AI use-case idea.
key_skills: AI Product Strategy; Business Transformation; Risk Management; Artificial Intelligence; Prompt Engineering; Generative AI; Data Analysis; Finance; Responsible AI; ChatGPT; LLM Application

title: AI for HR
modules: 3 courses: Intro to AI for HR (6h); Practical AI & Prompting for HR (9h); AI Agents & Creator Tools for HR (4h).
description: AI awareness; apply AI tools in daily HR workflows; create no-code AI apps, agents and workflows; lead AI-driven HR transformation.
key_skills: Business Process Automation; Prompt Engineering; AI Personalization; Generative AI Agents; Generative AI; ChatGPT; Large Language Modeling; Responsible AI; Ideation; Productivity; Risk Management; HR Strategy; Business Analysis; Innovation; HR Tech; LLM Application; Risk Analysis

title: AI for Sales
modules: 3 courses: Intro to AI for Sales (5h); Practical AI & Prompting for Sales (8h); AI Agents & Creator Tools for Sales (4h).
description: AI awareness; apply AI use cases in daily sales workflows; build custom AI solutions with modern creator tools; lead AI adoption in sales.
key_skills: Sales Strategy; Operational Efficiency; Multimodal Prompts; Sales Management; Generative AI Agents; Agentic systems; Generative AI; Application Development; Sales Process; Responsible AI; AI Product Strategy; No-Code Development; Artificial Intelligence; Productivity; Risk Management; Sales Enablement; Generative Model Architectures; Innovation

title: Prompt Engineering for ChatGPT
modules: 4 modules: Introduction; Patterns for Effective Prompts; Applications in Business and Education; Advanced Prompting
description: Learn fundamentals of prompt engineering; interact effectively with LLMs like ChatGPT; master role prompting, chain-of-thought prompting, and persona prompts; apply to real-world business, education, and coding workflows.
key_skills: Prompt Engineering; Large Language Models (LLMs); ChatGPT; Generative AI; Ideation; Workflow Automation; Applied AI; Prompt Patterns; Natural Language Processing; AI Literacy

title: AI Essentials For Business
modules: 4 modules (The AI Factory, Collision & the AI First Company, Network Effects, Transformation Journey)
description: The AI Essentials for Business course teaches leaders how to think about building AI-first organizations by understanding how AI transforms business and operating models. It covers the fundamentals of generative AI and its real-world applications, explores strategic and ethical issues such as bias, privacy, and responsible AI governance, and provides frameworks for leading digital transformationâ€”covering strategy, architecture, culture, and assessing organizational AI maturity.
key_skills: AI strategy, business transformation, generative AI, ethical governance, data literacy, digital leadership, innovation management, operational efficiency, responsible AI, organizational maturity

title: Oxford University Artificial Intelligence Program
free_trial: 20% of Course Fee with code IFAIP2025
modules: 6 modules: Intro to AI; Machine Learning in Business; Generative AI in Business; Robotics & Automation; AI Integration; Ethics & Governance
description: Understand how AI reshapes business strategy; identify AI opportunities for competitive advantage; address organizational and ethical challenges; integrate ML and robotics into business operations.
key_skills: AI Strategy; Business Transformation; Machine Learning; Robotics; Generative AI; Automation; AI Governance; Organizational Strategy; Ethics; Innovation

title: MIT AI Implications for Business Strategy
free_trial: 20% of Course Fee with code IFAIP2025
modules: 6 modules: AI Ecosystem; Machine Learning; Deep Learning; Generative AI; AI & Society; Driving AI in Business
description: Gain conceptual understanding of AI and ML; explore ethical, legal, and societal implications; build a business case for AI adoption; design and deploy AI strategies responsibly.
key_skills: AI Literacy; Business Strategy; Machine Learning; Ethics; Governance; Risk Management; Generative AI; Legal Implications; Business Case Development; Organizational Change

title: AI For Restaurant Owners & Managers
modules: Forecasting Demand with AI; Optimising Staff Scheduling; Food Waste & Inventory Prediction; Customer Insights & Menu Engineering; AI-Driven Personalisation in Hospitality; Compliance, Data & Ethics in Food Service
description: This course explores how artificial intelligence can optimise operations, forecast demand, and personalise customer experiences across service industries. It highlights data-driven decision making, predictive analytics, and operational improvements for efficiency and sustainability.
key_skills: Predictive Analytics, Workforce Optimisation, Inventory Forecasting, Personalisation, Operational Efficiency, Data Ethics

title: Google Gemini AI Mastery
modules: Introduction to AI Concepts; Using Generative AI Tools Productively; Prompt Crafting & Iteration; Responsible AI Practices; Staying Ahead of Emerging AI Trends
description: This course provides a beginner-friendly introduction to artificial intelligence and its practical applications. Learners explore generative AI tools, prompt design, and responsible AI usage while developing skills to automate everyday workflows effectively.
key_skills: Prompt Engineering, Generative AI, Automation, Responsible AI, Workflow Optimisation, Digital Literacy

title: AI for Fleet Managers
modules: Fleet Connectivity & Telematics; Predictive Maintenance; Route Optimisation Algorithms; Driver Behaviour Analytics; Emissions & Efficiency Modelling; Scaling AI Systems
description: This course examines how AI can transform logistics and transportation management. It focuses on predictive systems for maintenance, route optimisation, and driver analytics to enhance efficiency, safety, and sustainability.
key_skills: Telematics Integration, Predictive Maintenance, Route Optimisation, Driver Analytics, Emissions Modelling, Real-time Data

title: AI for Advertising
modules: AI-Generated Creative Examples; Predictive Audience Targeting; Dynamic Ad Personalisation; Campaign Optimisation Algorithms; ROI Tracking & Attribution
description: This course presents practical examples of AI applications in marketing and advertising. Participants learn how machine learning improves creative testing, audience targeting, and campaign optimisation through automation and predictive modelling.
key_skills: Ad Automation, Predictive Bidding, Creative Generation, Personalisation, ROI Optimisation, Attribution Modelling, Campaign Analytics

title: Go To Market Strategies for AI
modules: Understanding AI in Sales & Marketing; Lead Scoring & Forecasting Models; AI Enablement for Sales Teams; Predictive Market Intelligence; Ethical AI and Customer Trust
description: This course outlines how artificial intelligence supports go-to-market strategies through automation and analytics. It demonstrates the use of AI in lead scoring, market forecasting, and customer engagement while maintaining ethical data practices.
key_skills: Sales Forecasting, Lead Scoring, Predictive Intelligence, AI Enablement, Marketing Automation, Customer Ethics

title: AI for Product Managers
modules: AI Product Foundations; Data & Market Research for AI; Defining AI Requirements & Metrics; AI UX Design & Evaluation; Launch & Governance Frameworks
description: This course trains professionals to lead AI-focused products from ideation to launch. It covers defining AI requirements, integrating data insights, managing product lifecycles, and applying ethical governance frameworks for sustainable success.
key_skills: AI Product Strategy, Market Analysis, UX for AI, Model Evaluation, Governance, Agile PM, Data-Driven Design
